titles.title: Wheat Protein Determination Act of 1987
A bill to provide that the determination of protein content in wheat for purposes of price support activities be determined on an "as-is" basis.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From USDA.

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Wheat Protein Determination Act of 1987 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) determine the protein content of 1987 through 1990 wheat for price support purposes on an "as-is" basis without regard to a "standard moisture method" of protein testing; and (2) increase 1987 wheat payments if the "standard moisture method" results in lower payments than would have resulted from an "as-is" determination.
